headline.main: Health; New Drug Therapies Are Being Tested to Help Smokers Quit

byline.original: By SANDRA BLAKESLEE, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: As evidence of the health hazards of smoking becomes indisputable and the social pressure to stop smoking increases, researchers are developing new drug therapies to help smokers, especially those who have tried many times but failed to quit the habit.
